The Mediterranean is divided into two regions separated at 20° E according to the future changes in the vertical motion
30 (Fig. 1a shading); 1) Western Mediterranean (WM, including the Adriatic, Balearic, Ligurian, Tyrrhenian, and the western part of the Ionian Sea), and 2) Eastern Mediterranean (EM, including the Aegean, the eastern part of the Ionian, and the Levantine Sea).
